file.name: translator.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: DALiuGE translator
  version: '1.0'
  description: REST API description of the DALiuGE translator
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:8084'
paths:
  /gen_pgt:
    post:
      summary: ''
      operationId: gen_pgt
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            text/html:
              schema:
                type: object
      description: Translates a Logical Graph into Physical Graph Template and returns an HTML view of the latter
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                lg_name:
                  type: string
                json_data:
                  type: string
                algo:
                  type: string
                test:
                  type: string
                num_par:
                  type: integer
                num_islands:
                  type: integer
                par_label:
                  type: string
                min_goal:
                  type: integer
                ptype:
                  type: integer
                max_load_imb:
                  type: integer
                max_cpu:
                  type: integer
                time_greedy:
                  type: number
                deadline:
                  type: integer
                swarm_size:
                  type: integer
                max_mem:
                  type: integer
              required:
                - lg_name
                - json_data
                - algo
        description: ''
  /gen_pg:
    get:
      summary: Your GET endpoint
      tags: []
      responses:
        '303':
          description: Redirection to DALiuGE Manager HTML UI
      operationId: gen_pg
      description: Generates a Physical Graph and submits it for execution to a DALiuGE runtime
      parameters:
        - schema:
            type: string
          in: query
          name: pgt_id
        - schema:
            type: string
          in: query
          name: dlg_mgr_host
        - schema:
            type: integer
          in: query
          name: dlg_mgr_port
        - schema:
            type: string
          in: query
          name: dlg_mgr_deploy

Error: notImplemented: path "/gen_pgt": post: responses: 200: contents: unsupported content types: [text/html]
